resources.string: Press Connection button to connect. Hello I am Pepper. I can do many things. I can tell what is my battery percentage, talk about sports and many more things.
Examples of what you can type:

•How are you?
• What applications do you have installed?
• Are you plugged in?
• What can you see?
• What was the last thing someone said to you?
• Can you wave to the people?
• Can you tell them “Luke, I am your father”?
This is wrong attempt, can you try again?
There is connection error with server, can you try again?
You can have a conversation with pepper
